1.content:
we'll start with categories for the main story type. keep in mind these are subject to change as the story progresses. so dont be shy about adding a bit of other things in there, these are just guidelines to begin. and if you have a different type, or want to start a whole new thread, don't hesitate! just remember, its all in shameless good fun. no need for any dark, twisted harsh drama or anything. just good clean bodily modification goodness

your characters can be any kind of anthropomorphic animal or a human. maybe even catgirls/boys or similar alternate-species hybrids.

Choose your gender! are you...
11.title: Growth/Shrinking: Choose your gender!

choices: Tyler, a 5 foot shrimpy purple dragon
Fang, a 7'10" Behemoth of a black musclebound wolf
111.content:
These are some pre-made characters of mine, either from various other stories or interactives, or just popped out of my head. feel free to make use of them, or make your own! (please make sure when you make your own to leave an option in that chapter for someone else to do the same!)

Tyler: a shrimpy, nerdy purple dragon. overshadowed by his much larger 7'4" blue dragon brother David. gets picked on a lot, and though he acts timid around the big guys, hes Itching for some payback

Fang: Cocky, giant black furred wolf jock, star of the football team and general walking almost 8 foot tall wall of fur and muscle. loves to lord his size over others at any opportunity.
111.title: The Guys!

choices: Tyler goes to apply, but finds something unusual on the way.
1111.content:
Going to college was supposed to fix everything.

Nearly everything.

Most things.

Tyler scooped up his papers as they blew around in the student union courtyard after his brother, David, had knocked them out of his hands. It was nothing more than the plus-size dragon had done to him dozens of times before. This time, however, it grated on Tyler more because this was supposed to be his sanctuary. David wasn't supposed to be a student. He probably couldn't even pass the entrance exams. But his freakishly huge physique, combined with the eagle eye of a recruiting coach, had gotten him in the back door and into the football program.

Football with a side of wrestling.

And maybe, if his usual athletic excellence held out, some hockey.

David's way of telling his little brother the good news was to come on to campus, call him "poindexter", and knock his notebook out of his hands. Laughing, he'd gone off with several of his other jock friends towards the cafeteria.

Tyler was small; very small.

A rich purple in color, the five-foot-nothing dragon was fairly slender with a slight paunch and scrawny limbs. His wingspan wasn't much to look at and he'd felt insignificant in the shadow of his older brother for years. He knew David didn't hate him but his brutish ideas of "fun" and "funny" made Tyler's life miserable. They lived together in an apartment a few miles away and Tyler spent most of his time at the small, corner comics-and-games shop he'd bought with monies culled from a trust fund and his high school salary earned while working at an Italian restaurant.

But being in retail, even if he was his own boss, wasn't his idea of a good plan for the future. So, last spring, he'd decided he'd pursue an advanced degree at the university. Now, chasing his papers amongst the falling, autumn leaves, he wondered if it had been such a good idea. He'd been in class for several weeks and was starting to doubt his choices.

The last of his papers wafted up against the base of a campus directory. On it were pinned announcements of parties at the frat houses, political rally messages, job offers, and class notices. Picking up his now damp treatise on "The History of Sumptuary Legislation in the Roman Empire" his eyes caught a glimpse of something different.

On the board was a small, tan paper advertising a mid-semester course, open to all students, for two credits. The headline said, "Experimentation in Bio-Mass Labs: Changing Mass and Dimensions". Beneath it were several classroom locations. While "changing mass and dimensions" piqued Tyler's curiosity the words "survey class: free for first 10 applicants" were even better. The class, it seemed, was based in one of two buildings; buildings he didn't have classes in right now; that would mean he could get out of his normal pattern and maybe avoid David for a while longer.

But what were the "Metaphysical and Ancient Studies Classroom Building" and the "Advanced Quantum Chemistry Lab Building" the course was held in? He'd never heard of such things outside of comic books or Sci-Fi novels.

Curious, he decided to check one out and apply.
1111.title: Course Corrections

choices: Tyler waits around and applies for class admission.
11111.content:
Tyler stood beneath the eaves of the oldest, most intimidating building he'd ever seen. It looked as if it had been built in the mid-1800's, judging from its gothic architecture and spindly, peaked towers clad in coppery-green shingles. Moss grew over most of the roof and tall trees arched above its six stories. Tall, narrow windows peered out like a hollow eyes upon the campus. Between them, ornate cornices and elaborate lintels were carved with strange, unknown symbols. Granite gargoyles perched on each corner glared down at passers-by. Over the main door, framed between a pair of pentagrams, was a bronze plaque declaring it the "Metaphysical and Ancient Studies Classroom Building".

The small, purple dragon swallowed heavily. It was something straight out of Bram Stoker's "Dracula". The fact that he could see some students hurrying in and out of the building without a care made him feel a bit more at ease. If all those other students had no problem with a creepy building on the edge of campus, it shouldn't be a problem for him. He’d written down the name of the class, "Experimentation in Bio-Mass Labs”. Glancing down at the note in his hand and then back up to the arched entryway, he steeled himself.

He folded his wings tight against his back and walked up the granite stairs to enter.

The main hall was enormous. Rising high overhead, it pierced four, twenty-foot-high stories of the building. Stairs in the main entry hall rose from ground-level to each of the four exposed floors, above, meaning that five and six were probably only accessible from other stairways, elsewhere. If the outside was creepy, the inside was downright disturbing.

In the center of the entry hall stood a giant skeleton of a Neolithic bear. Wired together, and only partially evolved like a contemporary, modern ursus sapiens, the creature stood at least twenty feet tall. It was easily four, nearly five, times Tyler's height. On each of the ancient bones were inscribed tiny, pencil-tip-thin etchings. Each was a different rune or symbol that the dragon had only seen in bad horror movies or comic books that dealt with the occult.

This was a classroom building on a modern campus or a throwback to the Dark Ages?

The "Metaphysics" building wouldn't have been out of place near Hogwarts.

Well, an adult, scary version of Hogwarts.

It didn't take him very long to find the admissions office. It was on the first floor, beyond the entry hall, and around a corner next to a broken drinking fountain. He stepped up to the window and rang the tiny bell next to the sign "Ring For Assistance".

A deep, rumbling voice from inside, intoned, "Be right there..."

The words sent a chill down Tyler's spine and his wings half-unfurled.
11111.title: Getting Metaphysical

choices: Tyler decides to take some of the rune stones.
111111.content:
The troll that lumbered into view was less an actual, mythological "troll" than it was the ugliest, biggest dragon Tyler had ever seen. Easily fifteen feet tall, the bulky, green person behind the admissions window had to bend down to peer out at the tiny purple dragon in the hallway. His enormous eyes squinted.

"Uh, hi," Tyler said. "I'm here to apply for-"

"The class on scale and mass," the giant dragon finished for him. "Small guys like you always want in." His deep, rumbling voice echoed through the tiny office on the other side of the window and made Tyler's bones vibrate. His name tag said "Hi, my name is 'Drake'" and Tyler had to suppress a smile at the stereotypical draconic name.

Drake turned to one side and started rummaging around in a pile of papers. Apparently, no one in the Metaphysics building had heard of computers. Finally, he turned back and slid a form under the window.

"Here. Take this to Professor-"

"Dumbledor?" Tyler interrupted with a grin.

Drake just stared back, dully. Then, with a sigh, said, "No. Professor Taryl. Sub-basement lecture hall SB-101."

Feeling sheepish at the failure of his lame joke, Tyler took the form and thanked the small giant.

Finding the winding, broad stairwell, he began to see how someone as big as Drake could get around. The stairs were sized for titans! He passed a rabbit going up the stairs past him whose knees were at Tyler's eye-level. The rabbit's golden eyes smirked down at the tiny dragon and he gulped, hurrying on his way to the sub-basement. Coming out into the dimly lit corridor far below ground, he noticed in the shadows a tiny doorway leading from the stairwell into the hall. It was barely mouse-sized. Looking back, he noticed what he'd not seen before: a parallel stairway along the edge of the wall, very tiny: as if built for pixies or something.

A shiver ran down his spine for the second time that day. The ideas that started floating through his head were daunting.

He quickly found the double doors that led into the sub-basement auditorium "SB-101". Poking his head inside, he looked down the recessed rows of seats to the stage, below. On it was an empty lectern in front of a massive black board with curious sigils and symbols scrawled on its surface. In big, block letters, the words "DO NOT ERASE" were written nearby in chalk.

"Uh, Doctor Taryl? Professor?"

There was no answer.

He went down the stairs. In the center of the stage, towards the front edge, was a counter about twelve feet long and four feet high. On the back side were dozens of drawers while, on the top, ancient deposits of wax, as if from centuries of candles, colored the grey marble. Curious, he poked around.

In one drawer, he drew up short.

The lock was old and clearly broken but it had come open anyway. Inside were several small bins holding smooth, agate-like rocks. Each had a symbol carved into its surface and gave off an eerie luminescence. He felt a warmth flow over him at the sight.

Curious and a bit excited, he reached forward to examine the stones.
111111.title: Admission

1111111.content:
The purple drake eyed the stones carefully. Each stone shone in a different color washing over Tyler. Biting his lower lip, his hand slowly reached out, slowly plucking a few stones from the drawer. Several of them shone in bright colors, a majority of them purple. It was a bit corny that a purple dragon loved the color purple, but he didn’t care at the moment. Putting one of the stones near his eye, he observed the grooves , a smile working its way on the drake’s face before he noticed a problem.

“Crap, if someone finds me here…” he thought quickly. Turning his head around in a panic, he found no one. He’d been waiting for Professor Taryl to arrive, but what if the professor got here to see him nosing around? It’d spell trouble for him, and he wouldn’t expect them to go easy on him because he was new. With only several stones in hand, he grabbed a cloth near the drawer, putting the stones inside and in his pocket. Their shine made them a dead giveaway.

Why was he taking these in the first place? Tyler was by no means a thief, but for some reason, he couldn’t help but take a few. They seemed to click with him. He didn’t know how to explain it, but he felt like he had to have one, even several of them. Besides, if the lock was old and busted, it wasn’t as if anyone really cared about them or they’d put a brand new lock on in the first place. Shrugging, the purple drake quickly closed the drawer and put the lock back where it had been prior to his arrival and quickly darted up the stairs back to the classroom.

His mind was a mess at the moment. He had to play it cool and stay calm. He patted the pocket where the rune stones were held, taking a sigh. As he kept thinking about the stones in his pocket, an odd feeling began to wash over the purple drake. He couldn’t tell what this feeling was, but it felt…good. Smiling a bit, Tyler let the feeling wash over him. The dragon rumbled deeply as one of the stones began to glow in his pocket. As the seconds ticked by, the purple dragon's body had been changing slightly.

You could see the dragon visibly growing, inch by inch. His clothing strained as the dragon wearing them added more and more height to his lanky frame. Tyler smiled, deep rumbles from his chest echoing through the empty room before he heard the sounds of a click. Blinking, the purple aura left the drake. Soon enough, the door opened to reveal...
1111111.title: Tyler decides to take some of the rune stones.

11111112.content:
He had nearly decided to leave the top floor of the sunken auditorium, back into the sub-basement hallway, when the door opened. He didn't have time to hide and still felt the tingling sensation that had thrilled him and inundated his now-enlarged body. His clothing felt so tight, now, that he wasn't sure what to do. Paralyzed with indecision, he thrust his hands into his pockets and stood where he was.

The towering door swung inwards to reveal David.

He blinked.

It was his big brother.

But as he looked up at the blue dragon's smirking expression, however, he realized that the larger dragon didn’t seem quite as “big” as usual. Despite the situation, it made Tyler feel slightly proud … even if he didn’t understand it.

"There you are," the dragon rumbled. He looked around the room and scowled. "I been tryin’ to find you for an hour. Wanted to borrow some cash for lunch. What're you doing here? Trying to avoid your big bro?"

Tyler felt flush and suddenly angry. "You ... you were following me? Damnit, why don't you just leave me alone?"

David sauntered forward and gave a brisk rub with his knuckles against the top of Tyler's head. "Leave you alone? Yeah: that doesn't sound like me." He blinked a couple times, looking down at Tyler as if suddenly seeing him for the first time. "You get new clothes, runt? Those hardly fit at all."

"Same as I was wearing two hours ago, when you tossed my notes everywhere," he growled.

"What? They shrunk in the non-existent wash?"

Tyler began to feel nervous and self-conscious. The more David looked at him, the more it was clear that the purple dragon was no longer five-foot-nothing. He'd been standing down a few steps from the top of the auditorium so his older brother probably hadn't noticed right away. But there was no hiding it: Tyler was about five-foot-eight or five-foot-ten.

The smaller dragon tried to push past David. "Leave me alone. I'm applying for a class."

"Yeah? That class have some kind of super work-out? You look ... bigger."

Tyler pushed against David and felt his older brother stumble back a few steps. It surprised both of them. Normally it would have been like a kitten batting at a solid-lead ball of yarn; David shouldn't have budged. But Tyler had more power behind his push.

"Okay, what the fuck is going on?" David demanded. "You ... you are bigger! What did you do?"

"Just leave me be!" Tyler shouted and pushed against David again.

This time, however, his older brother was ready for him and caught his hand, firmly. Then, moving swiftly, he spun Tyler around and reached down to grab him around the waist. Normally, this meant that David was about to flip Tyler upside-down and hold him by his ankles, but his new mass was making it a bit hard for the bigger dragon. Instead, David only half-succeeded before stumbling and dropping Tyler on the top level above the stairs.

Tyler yelped in pain and annoyance. Moments later, though, he felt a surge of fear as he heard several clattering sounds. He looked up, seeing the colored stones fall out of his pocket and scatter across the floor. Their varicolored glows flickered across the walls and drew his brother’s immediate attention.

"What are these?" he asked.

“Nothing!” Before Tyler could stop him, however, his older brother reached down and picked up three of the run-inscribed rocks: two purple and one, yellow. "Give 'em back!"

There were still four on the floor but Tyler was afraid of what the three David already held in his hand would do.
11111112.title: David's Return

choices: See what these stones can do.
Keep quiet and put the stones back.
111111121.content:
“Hand ‘em over!” Tyler pleaded. David merely snorted, eyeing the three colored rocks in his hand. They shone brightly, illuminating his entire hand. The purple drake continued his please, but none of them reached the elder sibling’s ears. It wasn’t as if he was ignoring him, but rather he didn’t acknowledge it. For some reason, all of his attention had been focused on the three stones. He couldn’t tell what he was feeling, but he felt like he [i]had[/i] to use the stones. He didn’t know how or why, just had he had to. It was an unexplainable feeling.

Soon enough, the dragon’s body began shining with the same aura that had enveloped Tyler once before.

“David!” Tyler snarled, but his voice reached deaf ears.

As before, David began growing right before Tyler’s eyes. Beforehand, David had towered over his younger brother in terms of height and muscle. Soon after the stones had affected his younger sibling, Tyler loomed over him, if only by a few feet. That little revelation set something off within the blue dragon. David was a bit slow, but he wasn’t stupid. These stones had to have had done something to him in the first place, David was going to take advantage of that, regardless of whatever consequences came of it.
The slight fire of jealousy burning in David, his already form fitting clothes began to strain slightly against his muscled frame. Tyler gulped, watching the purple aura begin to surround his brother. His gaze soon fell upon the other stones on the ground near him. In a mad dash, Tyler ran, grabbing the rest off of the floor, scampering away from his brother after suffering a small trip.

At that point, David continued growing, his shirt and pants already straining and beginning to show signs of breaking as they couldn’t possibly contained the bulk of the still growing dragon. Soon enough, David matched Tyler’s current height and soon enough, his chest obscured most of his view (not like it did most of the time already, considering how big he was in the first place). Tyler merely stared, clutching the remaining stones in surprise and anger.

Why the hell did he have to mess everything up!?

The purple aura soon left David’s body, a smirk rising on his face.

“Well, well, well, what do we have here?”

“Did you really have to do that!?” Tyler snarled, still slightly mad at the fact that his brother had basically ruined what little plan he had left. He was going to keep the stones and see what they did, but that much was obvious. And considering how David was and how he is now…they had a problem. Looking at the remaining stones in his hand, Tyler sighed, looking up at David.

“David, we should…”
111111121.title: David starts to grow.

choices: "Maybe you're right... lets try to fix this"
"If i get a bit bigger, i can just make my own door...!"
1111111211.content:
“See what these other stones do, we have to fix this!” Tyler exclaimed worryingly. he stared up at the towering beast his brother had become, gulping audiably as he sized the blue drake up and down. after his own growth spurt, he had broken the 8 foot mark, leaving him about a foot or so taller than his brother’s old 7’4 height. That alone had left most of Tyler’s own clothes in tatters. small scraps of his shirt clinging to his torso, while his jeans had shredded at the seams, split down the back, and were little more than a pair of indecent ‘hulk shorts’ around his thighs and swollen groin. But after David’s turn with the stones, he was practically stark naked, tiny shreds of cloth clinging to the front of his own hefty endowment as it swung and jostled with slight shifts of the blue dragon’s weight. Tyler was huge at 8’5”... and he barely came up to David’s chest now. The blue dragon’s head was nearly grazing the 12 foot ceiling!

“I could still pass as unusually large, but you’re just a freak now David! noone would believe that you’re normal when you’re big!” He exclaimed. frankly he was more pissed that David had upstaged him... again, but was also worried what the newly grown David would do in retaliation for Tyler trying to outgrow him.

“Oh i see how it is” David’s voice rumbled out, several octaves deeper and notches louder with his increased size. “You get to keep your new height, but i don’t... you just want to be taller than me!” he accused, crouching down infront of his smaller brother, whos earfins wilted and he took a step back out of reflex

“Thats not it at all!” Tyler boldface lied, tail nervously curling around his leg like it always did when he was nervous or afraid “You can’t even get out of the room, you’re too big for the door! If you can’t even get out of this room, how are you going to do anything else in life!?” He practically ranted. Inside, Tyler was screaming a much different tune, yelling and ranting about how he should be the one having those problems, not David. he should be the one having to crouch down to not hit his head, not his thick headed older brother.

“Well... you know Tyler...” David rumbled...
1111111211.title: Convincing a giant

choices: Grow and convince David the hard way.
See if one of the stones can shrink him.
11111112112.content:
Hearing Tyler speak and rant were one of the few things David wanted to do at the moment. With his newfound height the younger drake attempted to convince him to find some way to return back to normal, providing many reasons as to why. In normal circumstances, the larger, bulkier drake would listen to his words, seeing as how he had a good head on his shoulders. At the moment, all he heard were reasons that would simply benefit Tyler. Why should he get to keep his newfound height and the elder sibling couldn’t?

It seemed damn well unfair.

As the purple drake finished ranting and raving about the consequences, David crossed his arms, a low rumble erupting from his throat. “Well, you know, Tyler…” he began, his muzzle forming something akin to a scowl, then a smirk.

“Most of these problems…I don’t care about. So what if I’m bigger? Honestly, it’s a good feeling. And besides, I can easily get out of this room…” his rumbles beginning to get a bit louder.

Tyler stared up at his booming brother, wondering what was going through his thick head. He wanted to stand his ground, but his legs were clearly betraying him as he kept stepping back towards the entrance. A clear look at the entrance and David’s current height meant that he wouldn’t be able to fit unless he just broke through it without caring.

“Crap…” The purple drake muttered.

Without warning, David clutched the stones in his hand once more, the purple aura surrounding his body as he continued growing. Before, the blue dragon’s head almost reached the ceiling, his tail almost able to cover the entire expanse of the room. As he kept growing, his head soon reached the roof, making him crouch his head down as Tyler simply had to crane his neck to look up at his still swelling brother.

A fearful look struck Tyler’s face as David soon began to walk, his footsteps making large thuds that shook across the room with ease. Tyler bolted out of the door, David not far behind. A resounding crash shook through the area as David had just destroyed the entrance and the surrounding walls. The material crashing from the broken wall and door merely bounced off David’s thick muscled hide, Tyler looking on in a mix of anger and jealousy.

Looking around, there seemed to be no one in the area…for now. Someone must have heard that gigantic crash and would be looking to come here and see the both of them. At this point, he could either…
11111112112.title: "If i get a bit bigger, i can just make my ...

choices: They had both returned to normal!
Tyler had lied/was wrong about it wearing off, and the effect gets worse!
111111122.content:
Damn it David give them back!” Tyler snarled out angrily as he reached out to grab the stones, which David quickly raised his arm back behind him so they were out of Tyler's reach. The purple dragon barred his fangs, pushing back against the forearm David was using to hold him back, arms reaching to either side of his blue skinned brother to try to grab at the stones. As he gave a sudden, harder push David gave a yelp and found himself stumbling backwards, losing his footing on the bottom step and falling flat on his ass, stones still held firmly in his grip. Quickly David barred his own fangs, snarling loudly as he shot up to his feet to yell at Tyler, but found himself stopping halfway through his first word as a still irritated looking, and adamant Tyler stepped his way down the lecture hall's stairs and upon reaching the bottom step where David was... found himself eye to eye with the blue dragon.

It took a second for it to dawn on the both of them the gravity of what was happening... worse for David, as while it was sinking in that not only had his brother grown almost a full foot in height, leaving Tyler now roughly 6 foot tall, but David, the formerly over 7 foot beast of a dragon was now having to hold his pants up, as he stared UP at his 6 foot brother's chin... he had, and still was, shrinking!

“Wh... what the...?!” David yelped out in surprise and worry, as he found the classroom slowly increasing in size all around him. Chairs, desks, and especially his brother Tyler slowly stretching higher and higher into the air as he dwindled down under 5'9... 5'7... 5'5...

David wasn't stupid, but he wasn't the sharpest crayon in the box, and was not very good with surprises. Tyler, on the other hand, quickly had put two and two together, and was unable to help the grin spread wide across his muzzle, showing off his ivory fangs. Most people would still be freaking out, and in disbelief about what was happening. Tyler, himself didn't understand how it was happening, but the simple satisfaction in the situation was easily overpowering his confusion and worry. He had fantasized about this. (Well, not EXACTLY this) Since he and David both hit puberty and he was left in the dust. Being the bigger brother for once. Being able to shove David around, to look down at him without needing a ladder, to be the one in charge, whether David liked it or not.

“T-tyler, what... how... what is going on?!” David cried out, knocking Tyler from his momentary lapse into fantasy, and pulling him back into his fantasy made real. David was struggling to hold his pants up, already the legs pooled around his ankles and his his feet from view, and you could fit another half of David in the waistband. He couldn't even be 5 foot tall now... he was shorter than Tyler used to be. Despite how much he'd love to see David get even smaller, he still cared for him, just enough to not want to see him freaking any more than this (at least... not in public where he couldn't properly enjoy it), and quickly reached down, grasping David's wrist to lift it up and pry one of the stones from his grip.

Thankfully his guess was right, and after one of the stones had been removed, David seemed to stop shrinking. Tyler was a bright kid, he had noticed when he picked up the single stone, nothing had happened... but when he and David had a handful, they caused odd reactions, like making him bigger, or making David smaller, so he figured it had something to do with the specific combinations. So taking one away from David would stop the combination.

“Look... just calm down” Tyler murmured to the diminished athlete, still struggling to keep that wide, self satisfied grin off his face “we need to get out of here before we get in deep shit for messing with this stuff. Lets get home, and we'll figure this out, ok?” He told David as sincerely as he could. He wasn't eager to turn David back, but either way they couldn't stay here without risking getting in trouble. It didnt take much convincing to get David to agree, he was still rather freaked out and all he wanted was to try and get it fixed, so after rolling up his pants leg, and tightening his belt, the two made a quick dash out of the building and, to a flurry of odd looks across campus as they ran, rushed their way back home.







An hour later David was impatiently pacing back and forth behind Tyler as the newly enlarged purple dragon sat at his desk, surfing the internet. He had long since discarded his pants and shirt, as his new growth spurt had left them uncomfortably tight. It only added to Davids irritation at the situation to see his brother not only larger than him but, thanks to whatevere those stones had done to Tyler, but was now more physically fit. Tyler had noticed it as well, and it had taken 10 minutes for David to drag him away from admiring himself in the mirror. His growth seemed to have eaten away a bit of the small paunch Tyler had, leaving his stomach smoother and flatter, as well as giving him a bit more muscle. Just enough that his pectorals now had faint definition, and there was an actual swell on his arms when he flexed them. Worse still for David was all of this, mixed with Tyler wearing his undersized underwear made his one redeeming physical feature all the more blatant.

His endowment.

David got the height, the muscle, and most of the other good genetics, but if there was one place Tyler could keep up it was downstairs. Despite David being overall bigger than Tyler down there, it was only his over 2 foot size advantage that allowed that, if they had been normal sized Tyler would probably be almost half again as big as David was when they were both hard, and with him now bigger, and in tighter underwear, the bulge in the basket of his boxer briefs was down right obscene.

“Can you stop ogling yourself in the monitors reflection and fix this already! I'm smaller than you are! “The 4'8 dragon growled up to his larger brother, blue tail lashing about angrily behind him. This only annoyed Tyler more, and it was a miracle he hadn't already yelled at David now. The only thing that kept him from snapping at his brother most of the time was the height difference, and with that gone he was a ticking time bomb.

“its bad enough that you have to try to get all big and stuff to out do me, but to shrink me too?! Jesus Tyler what were you thinking? I mean, of all the retarded schemes ive heard of-...” He would continue ranting. Meanwhile Tyler's nerves were wearing thinner and thinner, fingers gripping painfully tight at the computer mouse. Just when he thought he was going to snap, suddenly his grip released.

“aha! Got it!”! He exclaimed, skimming over the page then turning to David, holding up two of the stones with the third one that had caused David's shrinking left on the desk top. “Ok... so these stones... if this occult site is right, are some kind of energy modifier... they do something about converting mass into energy, and vise versa. But the effect is only temporary. It should wear off by morning” he explained, sitting up and setting the stones back. “So if we just go to bed, in the morning we'll wake up and be back to normal” he added, seeming almost depressed at the thought. Clearly he enjoyed his new size.

David simply growled and crossed his arms over his chest, glaring up at Tyler “Good! The view down here sucks.” He growled out, turning his back to Tyler and, with an angry snap of his tail, walked off back to his room. He didn't want to spend a moment longer than he had to at this size so (With a bit of a boost from his bedside stand) he crawled his way up into bed, and struggled to get comfortable enough to go to sleep... Tyler soon followed, in his own bedroom... though his sleep came after about an hour more of posing in the mirror, taking a few pictures... and a rather intense wank session he was amazed didn't wake David up... he was taller, he was (if slightly) buffer... and even slightly more hung It seemed. He didn't want to give that up.

But soon, even his excitement was beginning to be overpowered by tiredness, and he found himself curling up in bed... ready to meet the morning, and what it would bring... for the next morning, they would both awake to find...
111111122.title: David starts to shrink.

choices: Tyler blows off David and goes out the back door to get some clothes.
Tyler goes down to see if he can make even more changes.
1111111222.content:
The morning dawned and two things happened at once.

First, as Tyler yawned and stretched, his knuckles grazed the curtains by the window.

Moments later, he heard a high-pitched shriek from the next room: from David's room.

Leaping up, the purple dragon smacked his head against the ceiling and felt one of his ridges puncture the plaster. His mammoth endowment flopped heavily against his thigh as he stumbled. He caught himself against his dresser and stared at the span of his clawed hand across its wooden surface.

Before he could gague his new size properly, another shriek came from outside his room.

"TYLER!"

He bolted for the door and nearly pulled it off its hinges as he darted out into the hall.

With a squeak, a tiny blue form cringed away, putting its slender arms up over its head. "Don't step on me!" he shrieked.

Tyler stopped in the nick of time.

He stared down in shock: it was David.

David had shrunk even smaller.

The formerly gigantic, big-and-buff blue dragon was now barely two feet tall. And Tyler, himself...

Tyler couldn't stand up, easily. The ceilings were ten feet high and his head was only a few inches shy of them.

He stared, amazed.

"S...stop staring at me!" David's voice with higher in pitch and fainter. His little lungs and shorter vocal cords made him sound like a cartoon mouse. "You were wrong! Your stupid Web site was wrong!" The tiny blue dragon kicked at Tyler's ankle.

Tyler didn't feel anything.

"Look," he said, "we can always do more research. Let's go back downstairs and see what we can figure out."

"I'm a freak!" David squeaked. "I'm a midget!"

"Well, most little people are about three to four feet tall; you're much smaller than..."

"THAT'S NOT HELPING!"

Tyler hid his smile behind one hand. "Look," he said, "Go downstairs; I'll be right there. Let me just, uh, wrap a blanket around my waist, okay?"

His bigger brother's eyes suddenly went from his own, diminished sex to the collossal cock and balls dangling from between Tyler's legs. He blushed and gritted his teeth.

"Fine," he squeaked in as menacing a voice as he could. "Just hurry up, okay?"

With that, he went stomping off towards the stairs. Tyler watched for a moment as he carefully made his way down, each descent half his height. Then, once the little dragon was out of sight, he quietly stole back into his room.

Carefully, he took the gemstones out from where he'd hidden them in the vent between his room and David's. A grin spread across his face.

It had worked!

He now know how the stones operated, at least somewhat, and his plan had worked! True, he'd almost expected David to be even smaller than he was but, still...

David was still shrinking and he was not only growing but getting more masculine and muscular, too!

He pocketed the eight stones they'd taken from the auditorium and he contemplated what to do, next.
1111111222.title: Little Lies

choices: Tyler's on his way to give Fang his 'Just Desserts'
Tyler could use some more size, and knows just the football team to get it from
11111112221.content:
He was massive. the thought kept rolling through Tyler’s head, and it was all he could do to keep himself from popping wood at the thought. It didn’t help that he could easily imagine his newly enlarged endowment was probably nearly as big as his shrunken brother were he to get hard... Oh no, that definatly didn’t help.

As quietly as a 10 foot giant could, he snuck his way down the hallway and slipped into the kitchen. Thankfully, David was now so small he couldn’t see over the back of the couch without having to stand up on it, so he didn’t see the lumbering giant his brother had become as he slipped around the corner and into the kitchen. From there, he was home free. a bit of a struggle, having to get down on all fours and turn sideways to get through the sliding glass door, and then he was free! standing so tall he could almost see over the gutters of the house, and his enlarged, newly muscled and heavily endowed form exposed to the cool morning air.

Their dryer had been broken for a week so they had to go old school and start hanging up clothes in the back yard, which thankfully left him with some options... unfortunately every last one of them was too small. he struggled not to laugh at the thought of trying to fit into one of his old shirts when he picked up what was little bigger than a large dish towel in size to him, that had once been his favorite Green Lantern T shirt. even David’s clothes looked like those of children to him, and for a few moments he found his teeth barred in annoyance. He was massive now, and wanted to go out and enjoy his new size. but doing so stark naked was going to cause more problems than enjoyment... not that he wouldn’t enjoy walking around and showing off the new him. Then an idea came to him.

The stones.

He already figured out that the one combination would steal size from one person to another, so maybe...

Quickly he laid out two pairs of David’s clothes next to each other. he lowered his paw down and dropped the same combination of stones he had used last night to steal all of david’s size, down between them, pointing from one set to the other. For a moment nothing happened ,and Tyler silently cursed himself for his stupid idea.

Then it happened

The two sets of clothes slowly started to become engulfed in that same, barely visible glow as before, and one set of clothes began to stretch out larger and wider across the grass while the other dwindled. Obviously the stones had some sense of the user’s intent, otherwise it would’ve shrunk EVERYTHING in david’s room last night and Tyler’s room would’ve outgrown the rest of the house. When he was satisfied with the change he plucked up the stones, leaving one of david’s clothes sets even smaller than Tyler’s and another so massive even fang would look like a child in them...

Fang.

He hadn’t even thought about the massive bully of a wolf yet. and as he started slipping on his (Despite being newly enlarged) Snug clothes, an idea started to form in his head... He was bigger. way bigger than Fang, than anyone else on the football team. The jerks that had always made fun of him for studying, given him crap at his little game shop, always lorded their size over him. Now they were as small to him as he had been to them... no, even smaller!

“Oh yes. I like this idea” He rumbled aloud, licking hungrily over his lips as he turned and with laughable ease stepped over the back fence, and started making a B line to his new destination. David could wait. he had other plans to take care of...
11111112221.title: Dress for suscess

111111122211.content:
Fang lived on the edge of campus, appropriately enough on the wrong side of the tracks.

The shaggy wolf was a genetic nightmare, blessed with height and muscle no one but an elephant could match. His black fur also made him stick out but far less than his abrasive personality. Simply put, he was a bully who never grew out of a high school mentality.

When he'd gotten accepted at the University on an athletic scholarship, he'd first rubbed it in the face of Tyler's brother and, once David had been accepted as well, pressured the dragon to help him keep his GPA high enough to retain the scholarship. Most of that pressure came in the form of him passing on his homework assignments to the blue dragon which, naturally enough, got passed down to Tyler as well.

Tyler was sick of doing Fang's homework. He also was now two full feet taller than the oversized wolf. All the years of his bullying and teasing felt like they pressed down on him. He used to wonder just how much of it also encouraged his older brother to taunt him since David seemed to always want to ingratiate himself with the other jocks.

With the stones he had, the three he'd mostly figured out and the remaining five he needed to understand, he figured there was no time like the present to do some experimenting.

Fitting into a taxi or bus would've been a problem and he no longer fit his bike, so Tyler walked.

It took him much less time than it usually did, his stride being twice what it used to be and his powerful muscles making his pace much faster.

Squeezed into his brothers enlarged (albeit still very tight) clothes, he got quite a few stares. He was a dragon on a mission, though, and didn't acknowledge them. Fifteen minutes later, he arrived in the right neighborhood.

The old railway station stood nearby, undergoing rennovations to become a gas station. No trains stopped here, anymore. On the far side were the tenements used by the students with either rich parents and influential faculty. Fang was in the latter category. With such a heavy emphasis on football excellence, several University board members pulled strings on Fang's behalf.

He knew where Fang lived, he'd been there once when David was dropping off the shaggy, black wolf's homework, so that wasn't a problem. The problem was first getting Fang to touch the small charms and, then, getting line of sight on the brute.

The first part seemed to almost hand itself to him.

Coming from almost the same direction Tyler had, Fang waddled into view. The over-muscled wolf carried his workout bag over one shoulder and took up half the sidewalk. He was on the far side of the street and not really paying attention to his surroundings. He would have missed Tyler completely if the giant, purple dragon hadn't called out and jogged across the street.

"Yo! Fang!"

Fang stopped and turned. His brows raised as he watched the titan jog over to him amidst the honk of car horns.

"Who th' fuck are you?" he growled. He'd clearly been working out and, despite Tyler's features being the same, at their current size he looked like a completely different dragon. "What'chu want?"

Tyler hadn't thought about it too much but knew he didn't have to. Fang was an idiot. Sure, he was clever in a brutish, cunning sort of way, but in social matters he was as smart as a brick.

"Hey; lucky I ran into you," he said. "I'm with the Anthro Football League; we've been scouting college players and I wanted to introduce myself."

Fang's expression changed to one of cocky self-assurance. "Well, took you guys long enough. You here to offer me a deal?"

Tyler bit back a withering response and played to Fang's vanity. "We had to weed out the inferior 'maybes' before we went after the definites," he said. "And you, Fang, are a 'definite'. We'd like to see how you do this season and, then, make you an offer."

He put out his hand, the gemstones concealed in his palm.

Fang grinned. "Of course you do," he said, taking the handshake. He blinked, looking down.

Tyler pulled back his hand, the gems visible. "This is just a view of the sorts of bling you'll be getting if you do well and sign with us," he lied. He kept the gems but they'd already touched the big wolf. "You still planning to live on campus all year?"

"Uh, yeah," Fang said, sounding a bit dubious from the weirdness of the stones. His cocky nature, though, quickly reasserted itself. "But what's this about me proving myself? I thought I was a 'definite'. You got another wolf bigger an' better 'n me?"

Tyler laughed. "There's no one like you, Fang; we just want to be sure you stay that way." He waved idly and turned to re-cross the street. "We'll be in touch. You just focus in keeping your winning ways."

Whether Fang waved to him or not, Tyler didn't care. While Fang hadn't looked up to him or treated him with respect, he'd actually talked to him like a relative equal. He wasn't sure if it was his size that had done the trick or the perception that he had something to offer the big, bad wolf. Either way, the first part of his plan was done. Next, he had to get some initial line-of-sight on the shaggy bully.

He crossed the street and went up to the rooftop dining area of the campus burger joint, "Andy's". From there, he could see Fang's windows and, sure enough, soon saw the big monster putting down his bag in his living room.

Ordering two burgers, two baskets of fries, and a double chocolate malt, Tyler spread out the stones before him. He was tempted to just steal Fang's size and add it to his own. On the other hand, he could also experiment to see what the others did in all their varied combinations.
111111122211.title: Sizing Up Fang

choices: Takes Half Fang's size, leaving him under 4 foot, with Tyler almost 14 foot tall
Takes All of Fangs size, Leaving him a couple inches, and Tyler over 17 foot
1111111222111.content:
He could experiment on Fang. See what other effects the stones could have. But the more that Tyler thought about it, the more he started to dislike the idea. What if he made FANG bigger, or stronger, or screwed himself up somehow? Why mess with success? Plus, by the time he was done stealing Fang's size, its not like anyone else would be able to stop him anyway.

The food had already half vanished down his gullet during his deliberation. He was a quite a big boy now, and big boys needed big meals. Before he'd have been surprised if he finished a single burger before, now he'd eaten both of them, was guzzling down his malt and the fries and was still hungry. And soon, he was gonna need even more to eat.

It was all he could do to keep himself from laughing aloud (Or popping wood) At the thought of what he was about to do, as he set the three stones from last night down on the table, sitting himself on the opposite side of them from Fang's house. His toes curled against the floor, his tail wrapping tightly around the legs of the two chairs he was sitting in, squeezing in anticipation and nearly bending the metal chair legs out of place. There was no going back from this one. A 10 foot dragon was massive, and unusual but not absurdly unbelievable... any more than that and it would be obvious something was wrong. Though in his opinion, something would be very, very right

The stones started to glitter briefly, as that faint glow began to cover them. Across the street, Tyler could just barely make out the same coloration outlining fang through the window as he was laying across the couch... and he could see the glow starting to cover him as well.

Tyler had to bite and chew on his lower lip to stifle a groan as he felt his body beginning to tingle, and then start expanding outwards. He hadn't expected it, but the stones were seemingly effecting Fang's clothing as well, as not only was Fang's clothing shrinking with him, but Tyler's were growing with him. An inch turned to two... then three... Tyler's body slowly starting to swell and expand larger and larger in all directions. It was lucky it was still early, and the restaurant was still mostly empty otherwise he'd probably have been discovered far sooner, but for the moment the only person that seemed to notice something was going on other than Tyler, was Fang. He couldn't help but chuckle as he saw the wolf's surprised face, watching him stand up in confusion as he tried to make sense of the room expanding around him, while Tyler himself saw the world shrinking below him.

Even despite the fact that Tyler's clothes were stealing size from Fang's, they were still growing tighter and tighter on him. As the stones took Fang's height, they were taking his mass as well. David had been a bit beefy, but was more in the swollen athlete levels... Fang was downright Ripped, and there was so much more to take. Tyler could feel his biceps plumping and straining the sleeves of his borrowed T shirt, feel his abs hardening beneath his shirt, his pectorals thickening and stretching out the front of his shirt, and his thighs threatening to split his jean-shorts open at the seams.

His whole body was growing, not just in height, but in muscle mass. He was even thicker than David had been at his normal size, and soon he'd be even beefier than Fang had been...! Already he was over 11 foot tall, and passing cars were starting to double take at the sight of him. 11'1”... 11'2”... He didn't know when to stop... he didn't WANT to stop. The power was quickly going to Tyler's head. As it would to anyone in the same position. Tyler had never had any Physical strength before. Sure he'd been smarter than most anyone he met, but that didn't often help when they could hang you from a hangar in the closet. But now, not only did he have strength, raw physical strength, but he had more than anyone else had ever had before... and had a way to take as much as he wanted. The only question for Tyler now was...

How much would he take from Fang.
1111111222111.title: Steal Fang's size.

choices: Tyler leaves Fang where he is and goes home.
Tyler breaks Fang’s window and takes him home with him.
11111112221112.content:
Tyler kept focusing his will upon the small, semi-translucent runestones. The three he’d learned how to use to steal size pulsed with the beating of his heart and with each surge in light and vibration he felt himself expand a tiny bit more. Across the street, in his apartment, Fang felt a similar sensation only, in his case, each pulse was met with a corresponding reduction in his size and stature.

The purple dragon’s smooth hide rippled with his body’s changes while Fang’s black fur bristled with his.

Tyler half-closed his eyes at the sensation. The bigger he got, the more he seemed to feel it. Maybe it was that the more extreme the change, the better it felt. Either way, the expansion of his muscles and swelling of his groin pushed against his borrowed clothing and made him shiver in pleasure.

Twelve feet tall, passed.

Fang, half a block away, looked like he was feeling a strange, surreal pleasure of his own. He had fallen to his knees and started to un-do his pants. Tyler, when he glanced over away from his own expanding pleasures, saw the wolf stroking himself, despite what must have been a terrifying situation.

Tyler felt the swelling of his own sex getting progressively tighter and gritted his long, sharp teeth. He scoffed at tiny Fang’s lack of self-control. He resisted the mounting urge to rub himself. Still, if he didn’t stop soon he might burst out of his clothing.

But his clothing seemed to be changing with him, so maybe that wouldn’t be the case.

He didn’t know.

He didn’t care.

He just put his palm down over the steadily smaller stones and willed them for more.

The two chairs he’d pushed together for his impromptu meal creaked beneath him. He looked down, once more, and saw that he was having trouble seeing past his own, muscle-bound, barrel chest. His build was already bigger than what Fang’s used to be and he started to look wider than he was, tall. Thirteen feet tall was but a memory as he approached fourteen … then fifteen.

The clatter of a falling tray caught his attention and he whipped his head around to see a busboy, a slender and oh-so-tiny fox, staring up at him from beneath the awning that led onto the rooftop dining area. Tyler felt his mouth fall metaphorically open. Looking across the street between the fits and spurts of his growth to see Fang shrink smaller and smaller wasn’t the same as suddenly seeing a normal person look so tiny.

The fox gaped at him as he grew yet, to Tyler, it looked as if the fox -as if the whole world- were shrinking around him.

“S...sir! Should … should I call the hospital?” the fox stammered.

Tyler laughed: a booming, deep laugh full of mirth and menace.

“Do I look like a need a hospital?” he asked with a grin.

The fox blushed, slowly shaking his head.

Sixteen feet came and went; Tyler stood up, scooping the stones into his pants pockets. The fox stood, transfixed. Booming with his broad, taloned feet, Tyler walked over. The tiny creature barely surpassed his knees. The busboy, white apron around his waist, came up to mid-thigh and he had to be five-to-six-feet tall.

The pulses began to fade.

“Don’t worry about it,” Tyler rumbled. He patted the little fox on the top of his head. He was a cute, little thing and that observation startled the dragon. He’d never really looked at any other man as “cute”, before. Were the stones making him gay? Was getting so big and powerful something that naturally lent itself to seeing other guys that way? Or were his changes just revealing something that was there all along … that he’d never had the courage to admit to himself, before?

Regardless, he knew he had tons of courage, now.

He felt his powerful body slowly stop growing somewhere in the neighborhood of seventeen feet tall. He flexed his wings, slightly, and reveled in how big they’d gotten with respect to the rest of him. His muscles and sex weren’t the only things to have grown and, now, he trumped any of the porn stars he’d seen in cheap videos. He was an adonis of dragonkind.

“Uh, your bill, sir?” The busboy held out the paper receipt to the titan.

Tyler smirked and pulled out his wallet, paying with the tiny bills -and then some- to the fox.

“Here’s my address,” he said, tapping his tiny driver’s licence in his wallet. “Come by some time; we’ll have a big ol’ time.”

He was flush with power and size as he left.

He had to leap over the edge of the building rather than going down the stairs, within. He no longer fit. But the drop wasn’t far; no more than getting off a particularly tall bunk-bed. The squeals of tires and stares of passers-by made him feel good.

But what about Fang?

He suddenly remembered seeing the tiny wolf, barely a foot tall, jerk off furiously in the neighboring apartment. He laughed to himself at the thought.

He strode across the street, in three or four strides this time, and looked in Fang’s second-floor window.

He almost didn’t see the wolf at first.

To Tyler, the shaggy, black wolf was barely noticeable. Insect-sized to Tyler, Fang was only a couple inches tall and panting, lying on his back, in the middle of his living room floor. His physique had dwindled down to boy-toy proportions and he looked like a slim and slender mouse. Fang wouldn’t even be a third the length of Tyler’s index-finger.

He pondered what to do.

He should really get back to his shrunken brother (maybe toy with the stones some more) but a part of him didn’t want to leave Fang by himself. A part of him wanted to show off the tiny, shrunken bully to everyone who’d known him.

Choices, choices...
11111112221112.title: A Growing Meal

choices: Tyler takes the ray home to test it further
On his way home, Tyler runs into someone...
11113.content:
as he approached the massive, rather ominous looking pair of buildings near the edge of campus, he saw something that caught his eye. On the side of one of the buildings was the trash chute, and a fresh load of trash had just been dumped out. Nothing that would normally catch your attention, unless something stood out. sitting, as if on display, on the top of the piles of soda bottles and wadded up paper was something that reflected the light with a polished hue. Carried by some unknown curiosity (Stereotypers would call it a dragon’s attraction to shiny things) he walked his way around to the side of the building, rather than the entrance, to investigate.

For a brief moment Tyler was scared at what he saw. at first glance he thought it was a gun, though quickly was relieved when he saw it looked more like a toy than anything else. It looked like someone had taken a toy gun and stripped some of the coverings off of it, so some wires and circuit boards inside were exposed, but the parts that did have covering were of some kind of hard, polished plastic.

Again, sheerly out of curiosity he reached out to pick the weird looking gun up, carefully turning it over and inspecting it. the wiring inside looked surprisingly intricate, and the circuits looked to be made for something much more complex than just making space gun noises. as he turned the gun back and forth to look it over, his finger slipped and hit the trigger, which immediately caused Tyler to yelp in surprise and drop the gun, as a bright green beam of light shot out of the end of it.

His eyes went wide as he watched the beam of light smash against the dumpster the gun had been sitting in, seeming to slowly ‘flow’ over it as if some kind of green, etheral coating. when the dumpster was completely encased in that eerie green glow it seemed to pulse slightly then, for lack of better word, ‘suck’ inwards, from all directions. and as it did, the dumpster sucked inwards as well... as it, of all things, shrunk! each small pulse of that green light causing the aura, and the dumpster with it to shrink smaller and smaller. by the time the green glow seemed to fade away, the car sized dumpster had been reduced to the size of a beer cooler.

Tyler simply stared wide eyed for several minutes, looking down at the shrunken dumpster. everything inside it had shrunk as well. the wads of paper that had been as big as his fist were now more like the size of marbles, bags of trash he would have needed both hands to pick up he could probably hold in a single hand.

Slowly he bent down to pick the gun up, being far more careful this time, as he rasied it up to look it over again. carefully he turned it to aim down at the dumpster again, wincing a bit as he pulled the trigger and, again, a flash of green shot from the barrel and once more engulfed the dumpster. within seconds it began pulsing, just like last time, and starting to ‘suck’ inwards, as if its mass were being pulled inside of itself to make it smaller. this time when the effect faded away, the formerly car sized dumpster was now barely the size of a lunch box.

Tyler continued staring for several seconds, mulling over what he was seeing and whether he was being crazy or not... before his lips ever so slowly started to twitch, then curl into a wide, almost cheshire cat worthy grin...

he turned on his heels, and rather than going to the building for that class, he made a B line straight back home... class could wait. if he truly was still sane, he had far more important things to worry about... like his new Shrink ray.
11113.title: Why would you throw that out?!

choices: Was unstable, and each shot changed the size by a random amount
Was persistant, at random things shrunk would shrink even more
111131.content:
Tyler still couldn’t believe what it was he had stowed in his backpack. it was a shrinking ray. a real, live shrinking ray! like something you’d see in comic books or in Sci fi TV shows! He didn’t think he’d ever ran that fast in his life as he dashed back to his house, all but slamming the door closed behind him and locking it. he wasted no time in tearing his backpack open to pull the device from its container, raising it up to the pale fluorescent lighting of his living room.

This time he was far less restrained and careful thant he first test. with an almost wicked grin he turned the gun on a wooden rocking chair in the corner, David’s favorite chair (Solely for the fact it barely fit him, and his weight made it creak loudly, which David knew bugged Tyler) and fired. the green beam engulfed the rocking chair, and soon it started to compact in on itself. smaller and smaller the furniture dwindled until Tyler could pick it up with a single arm instead of both.

He couldn’t help but giggle.

He was almost certain it had to be some kind of dream, after all, nothing this cool could happen in real life, right? But, dream or no, Tyler was going to enjoy it.

“Where’s your creaking now?!” He said aloud to the chair, grin growing as he aimed the gun and fired again, causing the already child sized piece of furniture to begin dwindling even smaller, shrinking down until it was sized for a toddler. then again, Tyler fired, shrinking it further... not stopping till the chair wasn’t even quite the size of a piece of doll furniture, the entire chair would fit in the palm of Tyler’s small hands, which seemed to only make him even more excited. slowly tyler started to lift his foot up, the end of his sandal hanging down from beneath his purple sole. “creak creak, stupid chair” he growled out almost sadistically, before slamming his foot down atop the chair. instantly the furniture cracked and crumbled beneath Tyler’s foot, snapping like so many matchsticks into a small pile of broken wood and debris, ground into the carpet as Tyler slowly twisted his foot back and forth atop it. God he hated that chair. David kept it around just to bug him... well not anymore. now it was just a pile of broken twigs.

Other ideas began to fill Tyler’s head, all but the obvious. He found a pair of David’s favorite tennis shoes, and shrunk them down until they were too small for even Tyler’s feet. Then, the couch that David bought because it was big enough to fit him, but was a bit too big for tyler to comfortably climb onto, he shrunk that down till it was the perfect size for him.

It wasn’t until the evening, near the time David would be getting back from practice, that the most obvious had started to dawn on Tyler. He had spent the last 30 minutes debating the ethics of it. on one hand, it was a thought so awesome, and so guiltily arousing, that he wanted to do it without hesitation. on the other hand he had no idea if he could reverse the effects of the device... the moral dilemma furthering when he starts asking himself... if he shrunk David... would he ever actually WANT to turn him back...?

The one thing that had never crossed Tyler’s mind was the device itself. why had someone thrown it out? it was understandable, don’t look a gift horse in the mouth, he was far too enthralled by what the device could do to question its origin. But someone wouldn’t just throw something out like this, there had to be a reason...

what Tyler didn’t know, when he heard the door unlock, as David started to come inside, was that the ray...
111131.title: It's my size or ill shrink it if i want too

choices: But David's shrinking doesn't stop right away.
David orients himself and demands to know what's going on.
1111312.content:
What Tyler didn't know, what he could only have known had he watched how some of the items he'd shrunk at first were occasionally getting smaller in fits and bursts, was that the damaged shrinking ray had lingering effects. The energy stored itself in the mass of the target and, depending on how much there ways, would randomly surge and flux, triggering further changes.

Maybe it wouldn't have mattered. Maybe his desire to get even with his big brother was too advanced. Either way, as soon as David came through the door -all 7'3" of him- Tyler fired the ray gun.

Ducking through the kitchen door, he zapped David square in the chest and kept the trigger pressed. The green glow expanded around his collossal brother and, like the chair and other test subjects before, then enwrapped him and started pulling inwards.

"What th'...?"

David's dialogue was cut short as a strange sensation went through him.

It felt like he was falling but his feet stayed planted on the floor. Still, the floor seemed to be shifting slightly ... as if the carpet of the living room was snaking out from under his feet in every direction. He got dizzy. Looking around, the room seemed to be spinning: the ceiling getting farther away and the walls drawing back from him. Everything was awash in a green glow.

Tyler's smile grew wider and wider as he poured more and more energy into his once-bigger brother. Seven feet came and went, soon to be followed by six. Tyler kept the energy pouring on as he shrank his brother to his own height and, then, further.

Soon, the once titanic blue dragon was waist-high to Tyler's purple hide and the once-littler dragon stopped the beam.

"Now who's the little brother?" he boomed with gleeful laughter.
1111312.title: Staccato Shrinkage

choices: "I've always wanted a big stuffed animal to cuddle with when i sleep..."
"Im in the mood for a bit of...'Fun' if you know what i mean..."
11113122.content:
“What the hell did you do to me?!” David snarled... which almost immediately caused Tyler to burst out laughing. David's voice was about 3 octaves higher pitched now than it was before, considering he wasn't even 1/3 his original size. “THIS ISN'T FUNNY” He would yell even louder, which only elicited more giggles from Tyler. It wasn't until David snarled and punched Tyler's thigh that his laughing finally stopped. The now larger purple drake lowered a handpaw down atop David's head, holding it there for a brief moment...

Then shoved.

David went stumbling backwards, ending up flopped down on his ass, as Tyler stepped forward to loom over him again. “Now now, BIG brother... you need to watch your tone.” Tyler murmured rather ominously, though his grin was still as wide as ever. “you should be careful who you raise your voice too... specially when they're bigger than you.”

the smaller blue dragon let out a quiet gulp as he stared up at his brother. He wasn't used to look up at Tyler. Hell, about the only person he ever consistent looked up too was Fang... but Tyler was much, much bigger to him now than Fang usually was. Hell, Tyler was bigger to him now, than he usually was to Tyler!

“L-look... just...just tell me whats going on...” David muttered nervously, trying to scoot himself back a bit.

“I Shrunk you. I'd think that was obvious” He murmured, still grinning as he casually twirled the shrink ray on his finger “i got sick of always having to look up at you, so I shrink you. I got sick of that annoying chair of yours, so I shrunk it and crushed it... got sick of that couch of yours being too big, so I shrunk it...its my turn to be the big brother now, so you better get used too it” he exclaimed ominously, using his tailtip to prod David's torso and push him down onto his back. Tyler turned to look back at the entertainment center of the living room, an idea coming to mind as he grabbed the couch and scooted it up to the entertainment center. With that in place, he crawled up onto the back of it, carefully balancing himself, and raised the shrink ray up so it sat on the very top of the entertainment center, near the ceiling. The same place David used to put stuff he didn't want Tyler to get.

“There... now I don't have to worry about you trying to take it from me. Lil shrimp like you won't be able to get up there very easily” Tyler teased, chuckling softly. He walked back over to the still stunned blue dragon, pushing his paws up under David's armpits and, with a yelp from David, hefted him up off the ground. “Oh wow, you're so light now! You been slacking off at the gym?” He teased, laughing aloud at David as he turned to take him back to his bedroom...

“Wh... where are you taking me?” David asked nervously, where Tyler replied with a devious grin.
